```{r}
head(mtcars)
distance_mat <- dist(mtcars, method = 'euclidean')
distance_mat
```

```{r}
set.seed(240)
Hierar_cl <- hclust(distance_mat, method = "average")
Hierar_cl
```
```{r}
plot(Hierar_cl)
abline(h= 110, col = "red")
fit <- cutree(Hierar_cl, k = 3)
fit
table(fit)
rect.hclust(Hierar_cl, k = 3, border = "green")
```
